elf_loader.h File Reference

ELF file loader. Add the ELF section to the pt_image instance or the pt_image_section_cache instance. More...

Namespaces

 dynamorio::drmemtrace
 

Detailed Description

ELF file loader. Add the ELF section to the pt_image instance or the pt_image_section_cache instance.
